title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 full boot on ac, charges and recognizes battery but will not run on battery
message:
[PLAIN][SOLVED] 820-3115 full boot on ac, charges and recognizes battery but will not run on battery[/PLAIN]

Greetings.  I have an 820-3115 board works fully on adapter, sees and charges battery.  With battery plugged in and fully charged, disconnecting AC kills machine.  When starting only on battery, get a 3 second fan spin.  Water damage by battery connector, replaced C6950 and C6950.  Tried other batteries.

Thought it may be a current sensing issue but u7000 pins 27 and 28 measure 20.4 ohms.

Any thoughts on what to check next?

thx,
Paul

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 full boot on ac, charges and recognizes battery but will not run on battery
message: What is PPBUS on battery? Was there liquid damage around SMC/U5010? If that seems ok then run ASD too.

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 full boot on ac, charges and recognizes battery but will not run on battery
message:
PPBUS on batt is 12.34.

There was liquid damage around U5010 - earlier I replaced R5014 because it was corroded and loose.

After running ASD, I get the following;

4sns/1/40000000:idor-8.247

Best I can find in my research is this is a power issue but can't find the exact code.

thanks,
Paul

title: [SOLVED] 820-3115 full boot on ac, charges and recognizes battery but will not run on battery
message: Looked a bit closer at U5010 and found a bad trace between pins 1 and 3.  Problem fixed!!!!!
